title: Who Is Better and Why?
question_text:
Mike and Ava decided to see who is better at the online game "Squashing Sweets". They each played three games. Mike's scores were $85, 122, \text{and } 117$. Ava's scores were $107, 116, \text{and } 101$.
Who is the better player - Mike or Ava? Also, what information gives you confidence in your conclusion?

choices.text:
Ava is the better player since her scores are consistently above
100
points.
Mike is the better player since his median score is higher than Ava's highest score.
Mike is the better player. Although he had one bad game, two of his three scores were higher than two of Ava's three scores.
Mike and Ava are equally good at the game, since the average for both of their scores is the same.
There is not enough information to determine who is the better player, because the results from these three games may be simply due to chance.
